steps.name: the user is on the Apollo 247 homepage
the user clicks on Health Monitors under Shop by Category
the categories page should be displayed
the user is on Health Monitors Page
the user clicks on Apollo products
user clicks on personal care products
user clicks on Baby care prodcuts
user clicls on OTC products

elements.name: user Landing on Nutritional Drinks and Supplements page

steps.name: the user is on Nutritional Drinks and Supplements page
the user clicks on Nutritional Drinks and Supplements
the user clicks on Nutritional Drinks
the user clicks on Sports Nutrition
the user verifies the Sports Nutrition page is displayed
the user clicks on search bar
the user enters products from sheet 0 and row 0
